SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.mvp4j.annotation
Annotation Type Action

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface Action

The scope of this annotation is the view, use this annotation to define an action to be executed when a certain event has happened in a component of the view. the action to be executed is a method presenter with the same name as the action annotation

Example with an action in the view :

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String name
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String EventAction
           
 java.lang.Class<?> EventType
          Optional Event type to add a specific event depending on the component
 

Element Detail

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Returns:
the action name

EventType

public abstract java.lang.Class<?> EventType
Optional Event type to add a specific event depending on the component

Returns:
the type of event
Default:
org.mvp4j.annotation.Action.class

EventAction

public abstract java.lang.String EventAction
Returns:
the method within the event's supported methods that it will be implemented
Default:
""
